name: Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89
description:
Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design with multiple endings and outcomes.

Key Features⚫Utilize your camera mechanics including sepia cam mode, limited blitz mechanic and B/W cam mode allowing you to see a unseen world

⚫Explore Moundville factory a former electronics production building which was later sold to another company and made into a water treatment facility. Rumors of the past say the building was not just sold though, but that something sinister haunts these grounds

⚫Features 3 possible endings ⚫Second entry in "The Lost Tapes" Series.
  • Strongford Penitentiary Lost tape 91 - Paid - Out now: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/strongford-penitentiary-lost-tape-91
  • Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89 - Paid - Out now: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/moundville-factory-lost-tape-89
  • Durium Hospital Lost Tape 95 - Paid - Coming Soon

Each tape features unique places and new stories. Each can be played individually and are not connected.

⚫This is a experimental horror title, featuring non-linear exploration with no hand-holding asking you to explore everywhere as the aim of the game was to produce a realistic urbex feeling. The game changes the longer you play & evolves accordingly, what ending you get is determined by your own actions later on. The game provides full freedom for the player, the game is intended to be played in a single session each time to unlock the different endings. Many elements of the game are randomized causing each play through to be a unique experience.

⚫Features
  • Realistic urban exploration feeling
  • B/W camera mode to unveil secrets and the past
  • Sepia camera mode
  • Limited blitz mechanic
  • Environmental Puzzles
  • Realistic audio design
  • No hand holding, non-linear exploration
  • 3 possible endings (1 secret ending )
  • Randomized audio design and events
⚫Controls
  • Movement = WASD
  • RUN = Left shift
  • CROUCH = Left ctrl CRAWL = C
  • EXAMINE NEWSPAPER / OBJECT = Q READ = E
  • ZOOM WITH CAMERA = Right mouse button
  • CAMERA B/W MODE = F
  • LIMITED CAMERA FLASH BLITZ = G
  • SEPIA CAMERA MODE = R = Activate  | T = deactivate
  • INTERACT =  Press E
  • Best played in 1920x1080 resolution
  • You can adjust quality settings inside the game through ESC > Options
  • You can view / edit controls inside the game through ESC > Controls

The game only supports Keyboard&Mouse .

WARNING: This game contains gore as well as flashing lights etc. which could trigger a seizure in some, play at your own risk.

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10
    • Processor: Intel i5
    • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Standard

            Recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

Thanks for your purchase and for your support, hope  you enjoy playing this tape!

Created by Aza Game Studio. www.azagamestudio.com
